landingPage.title: Want
landingPage.subtitle: Redefining Online Commerce
landingPage.description: Want is the marketplace where users post what they want and receive offers. Connect buyers with sellers effortlessly. Find what you're looking for or discover potential customers. Simplifying the buying and selling experience.
landingPage.buyDescription: In a marketplace where you can post what you want at a price you can afford, without worrying about searching through countless products. Here, you can let sellers make you the best offers.
landingPage.sellDescription: Want is also a platform where you can sell your products or services to all users who posted that they need it. You can make offers and initiate negotiations.
landingPage.anywhereDescription: On Want, you can post what you want or make offers for your products or services from anywhere in the world, based on the locations of buyers and sellers.
landingPage.secureDescription: With a community that constantly rates the reputation of users and takes secure measures to conduct business transparently and responsibly.
landingPage.secureDataDescription: At Want, we encrypt your passwords so that no one, not even ourselves, has access to them. All thanks to our security protocols and processes.
landingPage.privacyDescription: At Want, we respect your privacy and do not share or sell your public or private information from our platform. We strive to create an ethical and respectful e-commerce environment.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Want
termsAndConditions.disclaimerContent: The Want platform aims to connect users so they can interact and transact with each other. However, Want is not responsible for the actions or conduct of users on the platform, nor for any result or consequence that may arise from such actions.
termsAndConditions.paymentServicesContent: Want does not provide payment services or financial transactions between users. Users are responsible for carrying out any financial transaction at their own risk, and agree that Want will not be liable for any damage, loss, or claim that may arise from such transactions.
termsAndConditions.contentModerationContent: The Want platform strives to ensure the quality and integrity of content posted on the platform. Users agree that they are prohibited from posting illegal, obscene, violent, or otherwise inappropriate content on the platform. Want is not responsible for any damage or consequence that may arise from any content posted on the platform. If any illegal or inappropriate content is identified, Want will take necessary measures to remove such content and report responsible users to the relevant authorities.
termsAndConditions.dataSecurityContent: Want is committed to taking reasonable measures to protect the personal and financial information of its users. However, users agree that Want will not be liable for any damage, loss, or claim that may arise from the unauthorized use of their personal or financial information.
termsAndConditions.disputesContent: Want is not responsible for any dispute, legal claim, or damage that may arise from transactions between users on the platform. Users agree that any transaction made on the platform is their own responsibility and agree to waive any claim or demand against Want for any loss or damage they may experience as a result of such transaction.
termsAndConditions.accountSuspensionContent: Want reserves the right to suspend or close the account of any user who violates the terms and conditions of use of the platform. Want also reserves the right to take legal action against any user who violates the terms and conditions of use of the platform.
termsAndConditions.disputeResolutionContent: Users agree that any dispute arising from their use of the Want platform will be resolved exclusively through arbitration and not through litigation. Users waive their right to litigate any dispute arising from their use of the platform and agree that any arbitration will be conducted in the location chosen by Want.
termsAndConditions.userResponsibilityContent: Users are responsible for their use of the platform and any information they provide to other users. Users agree not to use the platform for illegal, deceptive, fraudulent, defamatory, offensive, or threatening activities, or for any other purpose that violates the terms and conditions of use.
termsAndConditions.intellectualPropertyContent: The Want platform and all its content, including related intellectual property rights, are the exclusive property of Want. Users acknowledge and agree that they may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or otherwise use any content or intellectual property of the platform without the prior written consent of Want.
termsAndConditions.accountCancellationContent: Users can cancel their user account at any time, and the cancellation will take effect after a waiting period of 30 days from the day of deletion. Users acknowledge and agree that the cancellation of the user account does not exempt them from their obligation to comply with the terms and conditions of use of the platform during the period they used the Want platform.
termsAndConditions.modificationsTitle: Modifications of Terms and Conditions of Use
termsAndConditions.modificationsContent: Want reserves the right to modify the Terms and Conditions of Use of the platform at any time and without prior notice. Users are obligated to accept the updated and modified Terms and Conditions of Use. The continued use of the platform after the update of the Terms and Conditions of Use is considered as acceptance and agreement to the updated Terms and Conditions of Use.
termsAndConditions.cookiesContent: At Want, we use cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our platform. Cookies allow our platform to recognize you and use all its functionalities. We use functional and session cookies. It is not possible to disable or delete cookies on our platform.
termsAndConditions.userLiabilityContent: Users are responsible for their use of the platform and any information they provide to other users. Users agree not to use the platform for illegal, deceptive, fraudulent, defamatory, offensive, or threatening activities, or for any other purpose that violates the terms and conditions of use.
termsAndConditions.privacyContent: Want does not share, sell, or rent users' personal information to third parties, except in cases provided by law or when necessary for the provision of services contracted by users. Want maintains technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect users' personal information against unauthorized access.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Want, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and ensuring the secure handling of their personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the personal information we obtain through our platform.
privacyPolicy.informationCollectionContent: We collect personal information from our users when they register on our platform. This information may include names, email addresses, phone numbers, and communication preferences. Additionally, we may collect information about users' interactions with our platform, such as profile views, transactions, and messages sent.
privacyPolicy.informationUsageContent: We use users' personal information to provide and improve our services. This information allows us to personalize the user experience, facilitate communication between users, and process transactions. We may also use the information to send relevant notifications, updates, and offers to users.
privacyPolicy.informationSharingContent: We do not sell, rent, or share users' personal information with third parties, except as provided by law or when necessary to provide the services contracted by users. However, we may share non-identifiable information with third parties for analysis and platform improvement purposes.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityContent: We implement technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect users' personal information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. We only allow access to personal information to employees and service providers who need such information to provide and improve our services.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionContent: We retain users' personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless otherwise required or permitted by law. If a user wishes to modify or delete their personal information from our systems, they can do so through their account or by contacting our support team.
privacyPolicy.preferencesContent: We respect our users' preferences regarding the receipt of communications and offers. Users can opt out of receiving certain communications or update their communication preferences at any time. They can also exercise their rights of access, rectification, restriction, and deletion of their personal information as provided by applicable law.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyWebsitesContent: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites. Users are advised to review the privacy policies of such sites before providing any personal information.
privacyPolicy.updatesContent: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our privacy practices. Users will be notified of any significant changes through a notification on our platform or via other communication channels. Users are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy from time to time to stay informed about how we protect their personal information.
privacyPolicy.contactContent: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please don't hesitate to contact us through the contact means provided on our platform.
privacyPolicy.agreementContent: By using our platform, you agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, we recommend that you do not use our platform.
